name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ad Vision - Free Ad Spy tool for Facebook

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Best Free Ad spy tool for Facebook Ads Library that will help you find your competitors. Ads and and save the most relevant ads

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
★ Spy on your competitors.
★ Shows Only Top ads, Provide a lot of value-adding features.
★ Filter ads by total Assets, By Page, by Date, Ad copy, website link ...
★ Save Ads 
★ Find competitors’ ads quickly

Searching on Ad library is very time consuming, since it doesn’t offer enough filters,  We used to scroll hours to find some winning ads, Fortunately, Ad Vision provides a more convenient and time-saving function to Filter and directly finding Top competitors' Ads & Get inspired faster by your favorite brands!

Ad Vision can collect ads you care about, Users of facebook Ad Library can only search and view the current information, but with Ad Vision you can see the history data of all collected Ads.

We hope this extension is useful for marketers or anyone looking to learn more about Facebook Ads. We welcome any feedback and intend to improve the extension and add functionality over time.
